org.drooms.impl.logic

Class PathTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drooms.impl.logic.PathTracker

  • public class PathTracker
extends Object
    A helper class for the strategies to be able to quickly and easily find paths from one Node to another.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PathTracker(Playground playground, Player p)
      Initialize the class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node getCurrentPosition()
      Retrieve the current position of the player's worm's head, that is the one found during the last movePlayers(Map) call.
      List<Edge> getPath(Node start, Node end)
      Find the shortest path between two nodes.
      List<Edge> getPath(Node start, Node node2, Node node3)
      Find the shortest path from the start node that leads through the other two nodes in any order.
      Player getPlayer() 
      Playground getPlayground() 
      protected void movePlayers(Map<Player,Deque<Node>> newPositions)
      Update the internal state of this class so that future paths can avoid places where the worms currently reside.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PathTracker

        public PathTracker(Playground playground,
           Player p)
        Initialize the class.
        Parameters:
        playground - The playground to base the path-finding algos on.
        p - The player that will be using this particular instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPosition

        public Node getCurrentPosition()
        Retrieve the current position of the player's worm's head, that is the one found during the last movePlayers(Map) call.
        Returns:
        The position, or null if movePlayers(Map) had never been called before.

      • getPath

        public List<Edge> getPath(Node start,
                 Node end)
        Find the shortest path between two nodes.
        Parameters:
        start - Beginning of the path.
        end - End of the path.
        Returns:
        Unmodifiable list of nodes on the path, ordered from start to end. Empty if path cannot be found.

      • getPath

        public List<Edge> getPath(Node start,
                 Node node2,
                 Node node3)
        Find the shortest path from the start node that leads through the other two nodes in any order.
        Parameters:
        start - Beginning of the path.
        node2 - Any of the other two nodes.
        node3 - Any of the other two nodes.
        Returns:
        Unmodifiable list of nodes on the path, ordered from start to end. Empty if path cannot be found.

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()

      • getPlayground

        public Playground getPlayground()

      • movePlayers

        protected void movePlayers(Map<Player,Deque<Node>> newPositions)
        Update the internal state of this class so that future paths can avoid places where the worms currently reside.
        Parameters:
        newPositions - New current positions of all the worms.
